-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Core of TorXakis
--   
--   Core of TorXakis
@package core
@version 0.2.1.0

module BuildInfo
buildTime :: String

module CoreUtils
filterEnvCtoEnvB :: IOC EnvB
writeEnvBtoEnvC :: EnvB -> IOC ()
isInCTOffers :: Set CTOffer -> IOC Bool
isOutCTOffers :: Set CTOffer -> IOC Bool
isInAct :: Action -> IOC Bool
nextBehTrie :: Action -> IOC ()
randMenu :: Menu -> IOC (Maybe Action)
randPurpMenu :: Menu -> [Menu] -> IOC (Maybe Action)
menuConjunct :: Menu -> Menu -> Menu
menuConjuncts :: [Menu] -> Menu


-- | Core Module TorXakis API: API for TorXakis core functionality.
module TxsCore

-- | TorXakis core main api -- start
runTxsCore :: Config -> StateT s IOC a -> s -> IO ()

-- | TorXakis core main api -- modus transition general
txsInit :: TxsDefs -> Sigs VarId -> ([Msg] -> IOC ()) -> IOC ()

-- | terminate TorXakis core
txsTermit :: IOC ()

-- | Start testing.
--   
--   Only possible when txscore is initialized.
--   
--   modus transition general.
txsSetTest :: (Action -> IOC Action) -> IOC Action -> ModelDef -> Maybe MapperDef -> Maybe PurpDef -> IOC ()

-- | Test SUT with the provided input action. core action.
--   
--   Only possible in test modus (see <a>txsSetTest</a>). Not possible with
--   test purpose.
txsTestIn :: Action -> IOC Verdict

-- | Test SUT by observing output action. core action.
--   
--   Only possible in test modus (see <a>txsSetTest</a>). Not possible with
--   test purpose.
txsTestOut :: IOC Verdict

-- | Test SUT with the provided number of actions. core action.
--   
--   Only possible in test modus (see <a>txsSetTest</a>).
txsTestN :: Int -> IOC Verdict

-- | Start simulating.
--   
--   Only possible when txscore is initialized.
--   
--   modus transition general.
txsSetSim :: (Action -> IOC Action) -> IOC Action -> ModelDef -> Maybe MapperDef -> IOC ()

-- | Simulate model with the provided number of actions. core action.
--   
--   Only possible in simulation modus (see <a>txsSetSim</a>).
txsSimN :: Int -> IOC Verdict

-- | Start stepping using the provided model definition.
--   
--   Only possible when txscore is initialized.
--   
--   modus transition general.
txsSetStep :: ModelDef -> IOC ()

-- | Step model with the provided action. core action.
--   
--   Only possible in stepper modus (see <a>txsSetStep</a>).
txsStepA :: Action -> IOC Verdict

-- | Step model with the provided number of actions. core action.
--   
--   Only possible in stepper modus (see <a>txsSetStep</a>).
txsStepN :: Int -> IOC Verdict

-- | Go to state with the provided state number. core action.
--   
--   Only possible in stepper modus (see <a>txsSetStep</a>).
txsGoTo :: StateNr -> IOC ()

-- | stop testing, simulating, or stepping. returns txscore to the
--   initialized state. See <a>txsSetTest</a>, <a>txsSetSim</a>, and
--   <a>txsSetStep</a>, respectively.
txsStop :: IOC ()

-- | Get all torxakis definitions
txsGetTDefs :: IOC TxsDefs

-- | Set all torxakis definitions
txsSetTDefs :: TxsDefs -> IOC ()

-- | Get the values of all parameters.
txsGetParams :: IOC [(String, String)]

-- | Get the value of the provided parameter.
txsGetParam :: String -> IOC [(String, String)]

-- | Set the provided parameter to the provided value.
txsSetParam :: String -> String -> IOC [(String, String)]

-- | Set the random seed to the provided value.
txsSetSeed :: Int -> IOC ()

-- | Evaluate the provided value expression.
--   
--   Only possible when txscore is initialized.
txsEval :: VExpr -> IOC (Either String Constant)

-- | Type for solve (<tt>txsSolve, </tt>txsUniSolve, and @txsRanSolve)
type TxsSolveType = VExpr  value expression to solve. -> IOC (WEnv VarId)

-- | Find a solution for the provided Boolean value expression.
--   
--   Only possible when txscore is initialized.
txsSolve :: TxsSolveType

-- | Find an unique solution for the provided Boolean value expression.
--   
--   Only possible when txscore is initialized.
txsUniSolve :: TxsSolveType

-- | Find a random solution for the provided Boolean value expression.
--   
--   Only possible when txscore is initialized.
txsRanSolve :: TxsSolveType

-- | Show provided item.
txsShow :: String -> String -> IOC String

-- | Provide the path.
txsPath :: IOC [(StateNr, Action, StateNr)]

-- | Return the menu, i.e., all possible actions.
txsMenu :: String -> String -> IOC Menu

-- | Give the provided action to the mapper.
--   
--   Not possible in stepper modus (see <a>txsSetStep</a>).
txsMapper :: Action -> IOC Action

-- | NComplete derivation by Petra van den Bos.
txsNComp :: ModelDef -> IOC (Maybe PurpId)

-- | LPE transformation by Carsten Ruetz
txsLPE :: Either BExpr ModelId -> IOC (Maybe (Either BExpr ModelId))

module VersionInfo
version :: String
